name: Archive Anikii Dashboard

overview.description: The Archive Anikii Dashboard is a management interface designed for overseeing and organizing data from temporary folder storage and MongoDB. The platform features an intuitive folder-type structure visualizer for navigating data, a modal to inspect JSON code, and functionalities that allow users to download data with a custom name or store it directly in the database (admin only).
keyFeatures: Visual folder structure for data management
Modal-based JSON code viewer for detailed data inspection
Admin-only data storage directly into MongoDB
Built using Vue.js, TypeScript, and styled with Tailwind CSS

updateFeatures: Launched initial version of the Archive Anikii Dashboard
Implemented folder structure visualization and modal JSON viewer
Enabled custom data download options and admin storage capabilities

futureGoals: Enhance user authentication and administrative controls
Improve error handling and logging mechanisms
Expand data visualization and filtering options
Optimize performance and responsiveness for a broader range of devices
